div.a: BSD Earns 7th consecutive Mississippi School Board Association Beacon Award
div.span: Our Booneville School District has just been presented with our 7th consecutive Mississippi School Board Association Beacon Award for being an "A" rated district. Our school board, administrators, teachers, parents, and students should all be proud of the effort put forth. Very few districts earn this designation, and Booneville always ...
